layers

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • layers.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    this class holds a 2D GridElement array for the Game and is responsible for drawing it.
    Author:
    Brian Chau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(Game lm, GridElement[][] g)
      instatiates a new Grid object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      draws all the GridElements in the grid
      GridElement[] getColumn(int position)
      gets a 1D GridElement array containing a single column from the grid based on a horizontal column
      GridElement[][] getGrid()
      gets the whole grid as a 2D array
      boolean setColumn(GridElement[] column, int position)
      sets a column of the Grid using a user provided 1D array if the position is out of bounds of the gridwidth or if the column length does not match the gridheight, the operation is cancelled

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid(Game lm,
            GridElement[][] g)
        instatiates a new Grid object
        Parameters:
        lm - reference to Game maintained to query for width and height
        g - 2D array of GridElements to store into the Grid object

    • Method Detail

      • getColumn

        public GridElement[] getColumn(int position)
        gets a 1D GridElement array containing a single column from the grid based on a horizontal column
        Parameters:
        position - horizontal position for the column to get
        Returns:
        1D array containing the column elements from the grid

      • setColumn

        public boolean setColumn(GridElement[] column,
                         int position)
        sets a column of the Grid using a user provided 1D array if the position is out of bounds of the gridwidth or if the column length does not match the gridheight, the operation is cancelled
        Parameters:
        column - 1D array containing the GridElement column to be put into the grid
        position - horizontal position to put the column
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful

      • getGrid

        public GridElement[][] getGrid()
        gets the whole grid as a 2D array
        Returns:
        2D array containing the grid

      • draw

        public void draw()
        draws all the GridElements in the grid
